attributes.additional_details:
Please help people in the UK who suffer from hemiplegic migraines.  This type of migraine
Is very rare and mimics strokes.  Sufferers of hemiplegic migraine should be receiving the same
Help as a person who has had a stroke because the condition mimics a stroke.  Having spoken to many other sufferers they are finding it hard to find help from the government.

We believe that hemiplegic migraine should not be treated as a normal head pain rather it should be dealt with the same help and process as a stroke patient.
